daily_summary: Today's top-scoring papers offer significant advancements in areas crucial to the development of more sophisticated AI systems, including depth estimation, multimodal modeling, and foundation models. Notably, the MiMo-V2-Flash Technical Report and InfiniDepth push the boundaries of neural implicit fields and depth estimation, while UniCorn and NitroGen explore innovative approaches to self-improving multimodal models and generalist gaming agents. Meanwhile, SciEvalKit and LTX-2 provide essential tools for evaluating scientific general intelligence and efficient joint audio-visual modeling, respectively, underscoring the importance of robust evaluation and multimodal understanding in driving AI research forward.
